title: Psycho
description: A horror-thriller about a young woman who is murdered in a motel after stealing money from her employer.

title: Rear Window
description: A thriller-drama about a wheelchair-bound photographer spying on his neighbors, suspecting one of them has committed murder.

title: The Birds
description: A horror-thriller about a series of sudden, unexplained bird attacks.

title: Vertigo
description: A psychological thriller-drama about a retired police detective who becomes obsessed with a mysterious woman.

title: North by Northwest
description: A thriller-drama about a New York City advertising executive who is mistaken for a spy.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: A thriller-drama about two strangers who meet on a train and plan to commit each other's murders.

title: Dial M for Murder
description: A thriller-drama about a retired tennis pro who hatches a plan to kill his wife.
